去来: (きょらい) - coming and going; recurring (esp. thoughts)
去校: (きょこう) - leaving school (due to transfer)
参じる: (さんじる) - to come/to go; to participate; to perform Zen meditation
参する: (さんする) - to participate; to take part; to engage in; to be involved
参ずる: (さんずる) - to come/to go; to participate; to perform Zen meditation
参った: (まいった) - I'm beaten; I give up
参らせる: (まいらせる) - to beat; to floor (someone); to bring (someone) to his knees; to come
参り: (まいり) - visit (to a religious site, e.g. shrine, temple, grave)
参る: (まいる) - to go/to come/to call; to be defeated/to collapse/to die; to be annoyed/to be nonplussed; to be madly in love; to visit (shrine, grave)
参与官: (さんよかん) - parliamentary councillor; parliamentary councilor
参入: (さんにゅう) - entering (the marketplace)/introducing (something) to the market/access; (original meaning) visiting a high-class or noble individual
参入障壁: (さんにゅうしょうへき) - barriers to entry
参加を呼びかける: (さんかをよびかける) - to call for somebody's participation
参加を呼び掛ける: (さんかをよびかける) - to call for somebody's participation
参加可能: (さんかかのう) - possibility of participation; participation possibility
参加希望者: (さんかきぼうしゃ) - those interested in participating; persons wishing to participate
参加意識: (さんかいしき) - sense of participation
参加申し込み: (さんかもうしこみ) - application (to take part in); registration
参加費: (さんかひ) - entrance fee; participation cost
参加資格: (さんかしかく) - entry qualifications; joining qualifications
参勤: (さんきん) - going to serve one's lord; daimyo's alternating Edo residence/official attendance service (by a daimyo in the Edo era)
参勤交代: (さんきんこうたい) - daimyo's alternating Edo residence; official attendance service (by a daimyo in the Edo era)
参勤交替: (さんきんこうたい) - daimyo's alternating Edo residence; official attendance service (by a daimyo in the Edo era)
参堂: (さんどう) - visiting a home or a shrine
参宮: (さんぐう) - visit to the Ise Shrine
参宿: (しんしゅく) - Chinese "Three Stars" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
参差: (しんし) - of uneven heights or lengths
参戦: (さんせん) - participation in a war/going to war; taking part in a competition or contest
参拝: (sanpai) - visita a um santuário ou templo, prestando homenagem em um santuário ou templo
参拝客: (さんぱいきゃく) - visitor (to a shrine or temple)
参拝者: (さんぱいしゃ) - worshipper; worshiper; visitor (to a shrine or temple); pilgrim
参洛: (さんらく) - going to the capital
参照: (sanshou) - reference, bibliographical reference, consultation, browsing (por exemplo, ao selecionar um arquivo para enviar em um computador), checking out
参照アクセス: (さんしょうアクセス) - access; reference; fetch
参照キー: (さんしょうキー) - key of reference
参照モデル: (さんしょうモデル) - reference model
参照事項検索: (さんしょうじこうけんさく) - reference retrieval
参照呼び出し: (さんしょうよびだし) - reference (function) call
参照形式: (さんしょうけいしき) - reference format
参照文献: (さんしょうぶんけん) - reference document
参照検索: (さんしょうけんさく) - reference retrieval
参照渡し: (さんしょうわたし) - call by reference (computer)
参照経路: (さんしょうけいろ) - reference path
参照結合: (さんしょうけつごう) - use association
参照許可: (さんしょうきょか) - access permission
参照選択型: (さんしょうせんたくがた) - selection type
参画: (さんかく) - taking part in planning
参着: (さんちゃく) - arrival; payment on sight
参禅: (さんぜん) - Zen meditation; meditative consultation with the head abbot
参籠: (さんろう) - retirement (to a temple of shrine) for prayer
参考にする: (さんこうにする) - to refer to; to use as reference
参考になる: (さんこうになる) - to be of use as a reference
参考マニュアル: (さんこうマニュアル) - reference manual
参考人: (さんこうにん) - person given as a reference/witness; potential suspect/person of interest; witness
参考人招致: (さんこうにんしょうち) - requesting the testimony of an unsworn witness (who is not bound by perjury law)
参考品: (さんこうひん) - reference materials; specimen for reference; reference item; specimen
参考図書館: (さんこうとしょかん) - reference library
参考文献: (さんこうぶんけん) - works cited; references
参考文献一覧: (さんこうぶんけんいちらん) - bibliography
参考資料: (さんこうしりょう) - reference data
参薯: (シンショ) - water yam (Dioscorea alata); winged yam; purple yam
参覲: (さんきん) - going to serve one's lord; daimyo's alternating Edo residence/official attendance service (by a daimyo in the Edo era)
参覲交代: (さんきんこうたい) - daimyo's alternating Edo residence; official attendance service (by a daimyo in the Edo era)
参詣: (sankei) - visita a um templo ou santuário, adoração, peregrinação
